title: Bantangchong station
text:
Bantangchong station () is a subway station in <a href="Yuhua%20District%2C%20Changsha">Yuhua District, Changsha</a>, <a href="Hunan">Hunan</a>, <a href="China">China</a>, operated by the Changsha subway operator <a href="Changsha%20Metro">Changsha Metro</a>. It entered revenue service on 28 June 2020.
History.
The station started the test operation on 30 December 2019. The station opened on 28 June 2020.
